UserStories.title: Review Cart Items
UserStories.description: As a user, I want to review items in my cart so I can confirm my purchase before payment.

UserStories.title: Enter Billing and Shipping Details
UserStories.description: As a user, I want to enter billing and shipping details to complete my purchase.

acceptance_criteria.When: User fills billing and shipping info

UserStories.title: Process Secure Payment
UserStories.description: As a user, I want to make a secure payment so my order is successfully completed.

UserStories.title: Generate Digital Receipt
UserStories.description: As a system, I want to generate a digital receipt automatically after successful payment.

acceptance_criteria.Then: Receipt is created and emailed to user

UserStories.title: View Completed Orders
UserStories.description: As an admin, I want to view all completed orders for tracking purposes.

TestCases.expected_result: Receipt is created and sent to the user after successful payment
